website_summaries.verdict: When you combine the quality craftsmanship and practical design of this cart, you'll be pleased at the very reasonable price point.
pros: Has a strong metal frame and contrasting wood-grain shelves that pair nicely with all kinds of decor
Offers three spacious tiers and comes with 10 hooks
cons: Issues with wheels have been reported, including some that didn't move smoothly or lock properly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cart
customer_reviews.text: I don't often take time to write reviews, but I will do so when highly impressed by the product. I am highly impressed with this kitchen cart! All parts were encased in protective materials so item was received damage free. Also the kitchen rack was easy to assemble. The tools required to put the cart together were included in the package. The storage cart is very solid and should be able to support a lot of weight. Looks great and is exactly what I hoped it would be when I pushed the purchase button!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate to buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very sturdy, very easy to put together and looks great! The wood and metal are high quality. I highly recommend this microwave cart!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a coffee cart. It was incredible easy to put together and good quality for the price. Most importantly it fit my keurig which I was worried about. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart! I needed something to store my Instant Pot, mixing bowls as such to free up much needed cabinet space and this cart is perfect. My 17 yr old son put it together before I knew he was doing it, so I did not personally see it being assembled. He did said it was very easy. The middle shelf is adjustable. It seems to be very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for a little spot in my house. I wanted more storage space so I could clear some counters and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Jurewicz

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo happy to have it
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great find. I happened upon this cart by accident on amazon and from first sight, I knew I had to have it. I love this utility rack. When I received it I was so happy with the quality and make of this cart. It’s quite functional for my tiny apartment. It works great for what I needed, holds a great deal of weight, and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Good cart
customer_reviews.text: This item looks like the picture, but it didn’t quite fit the bill because it was too small for what we needed. If you’re looking for a sturdy, nice looking cart that doesn’t take up too much space, this will work.
customer_reviews.author: Gapeach

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! It’s perfect for a spot in kitchen with no counter space. We use it when cooking on stove. I bought it because the reviews said it was easy to assemble and it was! I also like that it can roll if you need to move it, plus it has brakes. I also like how it looks. I wish it came in more colors/finishes.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce H

customer_reviews.title: Small but so useful!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very narrow space between my stove and refrigerator. I had no cabinet or counter space there. I have been looking for a solution for a long time. This cart was narrow enough to fit. It is not too tall, but I am very happy with it. I move the cart in and out of the space daily. It is easy to move with the wheels. I also like that they lock so that I can use the cart as a mini island. The cross bracing makes it very sturdy. I could not be happier with this purchase.!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good for a Coffee Station.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a coffee station by our church kitchen. It suits that need very well and can be easily wheeled aside when the situation requires it. Assembly was fairly easy and the necessary tools were included.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old does NOT drink beer, LOL
customer_reviews.text: Looooooove it!!! I’m 5,6 and comes up to my hips. Looks super adorable. My husband and 7 year old put it together in about an hour after a few beers and distracted by the football game! Update: husband had the beers
customer_reviews.author: Augusta Renee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and useful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy cart. The instructions to assemble it were very clear and easy to understand, although the process was a bit more tedious then I was expecting. Overall, the quality seems good and sturdy so far. I am considering ordering a few more of these for other rooms if they ever go on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah K.

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made for the price paid.
customer_reviews.text: one of the rollers didnt fit well into metal leg as leg opening was bent..and after trying to bend it to fit roller, got feed up.. I threw it out!! wasn't about to try to take it apart to send back... went to store got a granite top and wood shelves for $12.00 more than I spent on this cheap piece of metal..this was very expensive for metal, but my dumb thoughts said maybe not...WRONG... if it looks cheap, trust your true judgement..I'll be going to store from here on out for things like this
customer_reviews.author: LaDajean

customer_reviews.title: Great product😃
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it!!! I don't have a lot of counter space so it's a great addition to my home
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Henry

customer_reviews.title: Good cart, bad instructions
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen cart was exactly what I was looking for color scheme wise. Matches my kitchen perfectly. The instructions to assemble were bad. Ignore them and use common sense instead. There are no words. In my box, my screws were not labeled correctly but I figured it out eventually . Once I stopped following directions.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Zahn

customer_reviews.title: sturdy cart
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working fine. We ordered it for a bird cage stand for our cockatiel. Seems very sturdy. Bird cage is on top, bottom shelves hold seed and toys. Great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Isenhour

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this looks in my kitchen! My husband had it assembled quickly. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JJones

customer_reviews.title: quick to put together
customer_reviews.text: The color of the wood is just what I wanted. I am using the hold my standing mixer and other kitchen items. Plan to possible roll dough on it.
customer_reviews.author: Green-Thumb

customer_reviews.title: Oh wow
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for something to place my water dispenser on and I finally found it! Really sturdy and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy construction. Very difficult to put together. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Beeler

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a plastic cart that was falling apart. It was just what I wanted! Sturdy construction; easy to assemble and looks great!! Ample room for all the baking tins and other things I wanted to keep in one place. Received it in a very timely manner. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina F

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my microwave in a small apartment! It’s also sturdy and looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I was very impressed with this cart.
customer_reviews.text: I needed some more shelving in my kitchen but didn't have a whole lot of room. When I found this cart I thought it LOOKED good but hesitated. I finally made up my mind to try it because of Amazon's return policy. I'm glad I did!!! It was very easy to put together, about 15 minutes or less. it is nice and heavy, very sturdy, and can be rolled any where. The spot I had in mind was just perfect for this cart and it slid in perfectly. I may order another one when I clean my sun porch.
customer_reviews.author: LadyCalico

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cart. We bought this for my husbands grandma for her new apartment. She has a larger microwave and if fit perfectly on it. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this as a temporary computer table. The item came packed perfectly. The manual was VERY easy to read and follow. Assembly was a snap and took very little time or effort. Everything needed was included in the package including the tools. Thanks you for designing something that did not take 5 hours to assemble and did not have confusing directions!!!
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I didn't look at the measurements so it was shorter than I had anticipated. Once I got it set up and in the correct spot, the size actually worked our perfectly. Solid piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two. Have a small kitchen and needed something for several outlying items. Dont know why I didnt think of this sooner. It has been heaven sent, now my place looks very organized. I use one with the back rail on, the other without. The one with the back rail on has several size glass jars/ bottles on the shelves and so it prevents anything from slipping off. The one with the back rail off is so that I could accommodate different sized/pacgkaged bottled waters and other bulky items. So happy with my results. I did receive one that had a broken top shelf, contacted the manufacturer, sent the proof, they responded right away and replaced my item quickly.
customer_reviews.author: twahjah

customer_reviews.title: I really like Mr. Ironstone products!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd product I've ordered from Mr. Ironstone, and have had nothing but good experiences. They assemble easily, they're sturdy when complete, and you really can't beat the price. They package them well for shipping, things are well marked and organized and the instructions are easy to follow. I'm actually using this cart to hold a 3D printer, and I was concerned before I ordered it that I'd have to make modifications to keep it from shaking and vibrating the cart. The cart assembles so solid, however, that it hasn't been a problem. In fact, the printer shakes less now than it did on a sturdy table I was using previously.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Saves so much space!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually leave reviews until I’ve had the product for a few days/a week until I’ve had time to actually use it. Right out of the box, instructions were super easy to follow and I had this put together in less than 10 minutes. It has stabilized bars for the back, even though by itself it looked pretty stable (I still installed the stabilizer bars). Holds my microwave on the top shelf and I still have two shelves left for storage. It comes with little hooks to hang dish towels/serving utensils/etc to help with even more storage. Overall, this was an amazing buy. Great price, great product. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small shelf and wanted a coffee/bar cart so this was the perfect compromise! I was beyond thrilled with how easy it was to put together. I did it in under 15 minutes while casually drinking coffee and watching TV. It is sturdy, aesthetically pleasing and functional!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: I chose this cart for my home office to hold audio equipment and files. It was easy to assemble as the instructions were clear and not hard to follow. The cart looks nice and seems quite sturdy. It is just the size I needed for a small space, as many of the carts I looked at were too big. The finish is attractive. I like the rounded corners on the front and the ability to lock the front wheels. The cart would be great for many other uses too. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy W

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble with a second person; I was unable to do it by myself. Would be a lot easier if the 2 lower shelves didn’t require long screws which need a hex wrench to fasten. Otherwise, I really like this stand for my larger sized microwave.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Great overall table!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Very sturdy. Easily movable. Love this table!
customer_reviews.author: JENNI K

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I need
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly what I needed for our small warehouse. I was tired or the microwave taking up space on one of our stainless steel tables so I purchased this item to hold the microwave. The 2 extra shelves gives me extra storage for other personal items like lunch bags, cups, etc. I totally love how it's on wheels for me to push around and out of the way when I don't need it and need to make space for other things. I highly recommend this item: easy to put together, sturdy, and works well in the commerical work place environment.
customer_reviews.author: T L

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great printer stand.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find a small printer stand. This kitchen cart fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Paulus Mount

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy/easy
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble but easier with 2 people as the boards are heavy so alignment is best with 2. I love the sturdy wood and metal. The color is great, goes with anything in my kitchen. Microwave fits perfect and other shelves hold large pots and pans for easy access next to stove. Only slight issue with it wabbles slightly but it recommends not to tighten screw too tight as it may cause an issue with them or the metal. I am loving it as it saves space on my counter and in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Rothermel

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of counterspace but I have tons of cupboards. Didn't want something that also had wine glass holders or tons of shelves. Just something small and discreet. This was the perfect combination. It fit my microwave perfectly with a nice little coffee station on top. I had the extra shelf on the bottom that I could perfectly fit some soda cases. Super happy! I set this up all by myself 10 months pregnant and it MAYBE took me an hour. Only because I was having to take breaks. The wheels also lock in place. Even though I won't use them I attached them to give it the little bit of extra height. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Piece of cake to put together.
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to build. Follow the instructions and look at the frame carefully before you put it together. There is an (x-type brace) that helps stabilize the frame. Make sure the frame pieces have the two screw holes on the same side when you put in together. Very simple. All tools are included. Also, if you do screw it up, very easy to take apart and correct. After it is all together very sturdy. We bought this unit to hold are two air fryers when not in use. By the way, the air fryers are fantastic (Cosori) also available on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: So Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item, not knowing what I would get. Received it as promised by the seller. I'm almost 64 years old and I put this together, myself, in about 45 minutes. I LOVE it. Not to big but enough to store what I intended. It looks great and I love the lockable wheels. I plan to get another for my printer, paper and other computer stuff. I'm trying to organize and declutter my place and this is great. Thinking of one for the laundry room, too. NOTE: Just saw they have raised the price significantly. Will not be buying another!!!!! Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Daigle

customer_reviews.title: My kitchen looks much better
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of shopping and a lot of wall measuring before I finally purchased this cart. I was so tired of having a cluttered counter I knew I needed something but I didn't want a great big bakers rack. At first I thought it was going to be to short but after I had it together I changed my mind. I love this thing. Easy to build, doesn't take up a lot of space but it hold a bunch of stuff. The price was a lot less than the others also.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett0522

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen cart with wheels
customer_reviews.text: Recieved my cart in 2 days. It was very well packaged. It took me about an hour to put together, not rushing and taking my time. It's important to follow the directions completely, so you attach the cross bar correctly. The cart is very sturdy and super easy to roll around if needed. The design is simple but well made and can be used in various places. I'm using it in the kitchen for my coffee pot, but it can be used wherever you need it. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dandilion

customer_reviews.title: Don't think, just do it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple, discreet and unrude cart for the microwave and other appliances we've put down in the basement. Hey, man's gotta have popcorn and pizza rolls when it's football. Most carts are very attention-getting, and that's the opposite of what I wanted. Something simple, blends in with the oak in my bar. It had to be sturdy because I'm not keen on a microwave oven going "whump thump whump thump" because the stand is too rickety to hold it. Not a problem. Five minutes to set up, everything in place and everyone in the family is using this. So, total winner.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: Long term integrity questioned
customer_reviews.text: Nice little stand i used it to move my 1.2 1100 watt microwave that was sitting on the counter for years and it works for that purpose however I question the sturdiness of this stand my microwave only weighs 35 pounds and the stand wobbles when microwave runs and the legs are a cheap grade aluminum or steel quality but it works Update 10/21/19 The company reached out to me and Appeased my concerns About the durability of the cart and compensated me fairly
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Good looking extra Kitchen Storage
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive in my kitchen. Blends in well. If it was just an inch taller, I could have stored my air fryer on the 2nd shelf. I managed by removing the rubber feet on the air fryer. The height of the cart is good, but an inch would have allowed more space between the top and second shelf. That was my only complaint. I have my IntantPot pressure cooker on the top, my airfryer and some cookbooks on the middle shelf and the bottom shelf holds more cookbooks and my crock pot. Being on wheels is very helpful too, should I want to move it around. Just a good looking, practical cart. Happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Helen L

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA, BUT OK.
customer_reviews.text: Received this table damaged in shipment. Not only was it damaged from the shipping, it had other damage that shows. Although it was easy to assemble (instructions were not perfect, but ok) worksmanship is questionable due to the chip on the edge which does not correspond to the package damage. All-in-all, I like the utility of this kitchen table shelf. It may be nicer with a type of fencing around the top of the shelf so that things don’t fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana Foster

customer_reviews.title: Works for what we bought it for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with our Ninja Foodi. It holds the Foodi and all its accessories quite well. We like the fact we can roll it out of the way or lock the wheels and keep it in place. It fit our needs well.
customer_reviews.author: SueVa Hill

customer_reviews.title: Solid Built Multi-purpose Cart
customer_reviews.text: Using cart in my home office. Use top shelf as a work area. Use the two (2) lower shelves to keep reference material, unread magazines and miscellanies items I want to keep visible. Construction was well-defined and straight-forward; it could have been designed by IKEA. Highly recommend this product for use wherever you need a roll-around flat surface with some extra storage space for frequently used items. Cart is a quality product for a reasonable price. Also, it has a nice appearance and fits in well with other office furniture.
customer_reviews.author: pgardner

customer_reviews.title: Well made product, sturdy and spacious
customer_reviews.text: A lot sturdier than expected, with great storage capacity. Granted, the "wood" is fake and looks it (hence 4 stars instead of 5), but in this price range it's a fantastic product. I will purchase baskets to store potatoes and onions on the bottom shelf, and use the middle shelf to store my cutting boards and coffee/soda flavor bottles. Assembly was straight forward. I would highly recommend it to anyone who needs it for a microwave or, like, me, to set up a coffee and carbonated beverage station. It would also fit a stand mixer or two blenders side by side.
customer_reviews.author: R. Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Average ok product arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: Right now it's in pieces on the floor unassembleable because one of the sides doesn't have the two holes/fittings to attach the cross braces. Lower shelves attach with screws from the sides (no support) into the mdf and hold only 15 pounds. Only top shelf is supported below. Laminate surface is colorful and pretty fake wood and seems good quality for what it is. I don't get why everyone is gushing so much and giving 5 stars. It's good but average. For my 67 bucks and having to return it to get a good one it's not a good value and is being a PITA. If I get a good one it's three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 15 min to assemble, which was quite simple with the instructions, I have a small apartment, so it is all the pots and pans, including all the wine glasses. It goes underneath the counter. It has freed up space in my kitchen cabinet. Highly recommend. It is sturdy and it rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Silene Lim

customer_reviews.title: A Solid Stand
customer_reviews.text: We got this to hold one of the new (heavy) combination pressure cooker/crisper appliances. It's big, but fit easily on this stand. The stand is quite sturdy and shows no tendency to wobble. It's got a couple locking wheels that don't seem to do much, but we don't need them in our case. Assembly was straight-forward but pretty much requires two people to hold things in place before everything gets screwed down. The fittings are very precise though and everything went together without having to force anything. It looks pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Vern Shellman

customer_reviews.title: So simple even I could put it together 😂
customer_reviews.text: Firstly I LOVE how this was packaged. Everything was nicely packed so it wouldn't be damaged and every peice was labeled. This made it so easy to follow along with the directions. I have never but anything togeather before and am not handy at all! The directions were very easy to follow and I was able to put it togeather without assistance, except when putting the second shelf on. I did need to have someone hold it because it was a little heavy, but I am also a weakling. It seems very sturdy and looks amazing! One of the best purchases I have made.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Simons

customer_reviews.title: Good Cart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our microwave use. It is a little shorter than expected but it will work great. Item came on time and boxed well. It was fairly easy to assemble with clear instructions. The allan wrench was fine but had a hard time keeping a hold of it because it was so small. After dropping in several times I ended up getting the set I had and used it. That seemed to work better. The cart is great and I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my daughter to try and use for keeping a couple of kitchen appliances on that she had to take out of a cabinet for each use, and after assembling it, with having the ease of assembly as parts lined up perfectly, the sturdiness and appearance all impressing me, I purchased another one for myself to free up some kitchen counter space and cabinet space. Both of use had plenty of space available for the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for her use
customer_reviews.text: We got this to put her new kitchen garden on. Very high quality and solid construction for the cost and nice looking. We like that it is table height (not counter height), so it blends in better in the eating nook and still high enough to tend to her little plants. Assembly was a breeze with the marked parts and clear instructions. She loves the little hooks and already has made use of some of them. All her other stuff fits on the two extra shelves. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I needed a place to conveniently store a large container of dry dog food and this rack fits the need. Also, in my smaller sized kitchen, when the refrigerator door is opened there is not a convenient place to put stuff that I am taking out or putting in without moving around the door. When the cart is place by the refrigerator there is enough room to store the container of dog food on the top shelf and there is still room to place items from the fridge. It is very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Woosh. Strong chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: I am so bummed that I returned this. It did look like it would be really nice. But when I pulled out the shelves, the chemical smell was so bad that I got a headache before I could put it together. Back in the box it went and was returned. I thought this was made with food safe materials. But that didn't smell good at all.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schlaeger

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small rolling work surface for my studio and after reading all the reviews decided on this one. I didn't have high expectations just need a work surface ASAP. I was pleasantly surprised at the build quality, it looks better than I had anticipated and is also much sturdier than I thought it would be. Very happy with my purchase and am will most likely purchase another product from Mr. Ironstone.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: 3 teir cart
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to assemble cart. It is very sturdy. I'm using them for my husband. One is a table by his chair in the living room. He puts his remotes, chargers, cell phone, nook, meds and beverages on the table. Extra things he needs to keep handy are on the other shelves. The second one is in his bedroom by his bed. He will use it to keep meds handy. The bottom shelf is a handy place for his shoes. The wheels lock and will allow him to move the cart as he needs to.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Embree

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, you have to assemble this. Yes, the instructions are in IKEA-speak (diagrams). Yes I had to disassemble it twice because I put something on backwards. BUT, even with all that, it went together easily. And I was able to do it myself with one hand (the other doesn't work). It replaced a very old plastic system by my back door, looks much nicer, and is working out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Clueless in California

customer_reviews.title: Easy, quality, good storage, good product
customer_reviews.text: So far so great! Was pretty easy to assemble - just tedious (as expected) and I have visual impairments and RA in the hands so 👌 Holds: my stand mixer, bread machine, crockpot, couple food bins, and still has some room. So plenty of storage! I haven’t used the top to roll out dough like I plan to yet so I’ll update on the sturdiness of it after I do so. Good quality for the price. Would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Duvant

customer_reviews.title: Works for My Needs
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cart. Rolls easily. Went together easily. One hole under top shelf gave us a bit of a problem. We had to glue the plastic part that the screw goes into to the hole. My husband said it was "stripped" but was an easy fix. I use it to keep several of my craft elements on and hide at night so they aren't all over my kitchen counter tops. Just what I wanted to accomplish.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition for a Small Apartment
customer_reviews.text: This cart added needed space. We moved pots and pans from inaccessible cabinets. It allowed us to move the microwave off the counter. We now have a great amount of counter space. What I didn't like about the cart is the holes along the outside edge where the thin rods for hanging accessories were soldered onto the cart. There should be some sort of plugs or covers for these areas.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rotti

customer_reviews.title: Nice little stand, but cheap broken in one corner.
customer_reviews.text: Came with corner damaged and another one showing start but not as bad. You have to be very careful when putting it together, because the board are so bad that when you tighten them they can warp the peel and stick what ever color you got. I am using it for a movable 3D printer stand and it works great just had the problem with the cheap boards. I might go out and buy boarding and put better ones in.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I am using this cart to store a Cuisinart food processor and a Vitamix (top shelf), a large Breadman machine (second shelf), and a basket of utensils on the bottom. Sturdy and plenty of room for everything. It is stylishly simple in a walnut finish with black metal and sits unobtrusively against the wall in my kitchen. It was easy to assemble, and is exactly what I needed to clear some of my countertop. I am happy with the value and quality of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Magic Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small galley kitchen and I am trying to create more space. Have been looking for a cart for microwave that is not too expensive and easy to put together. This was exactly what I needed. Love the look which fits nicely with my blue and teal beach themed condo. I had a little bit of trouble with assembly but worked it through. The fact that I assembled on my own is huge because that is not one of my strengths. thank you for great product that arrived quickly and was easy to put to use
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: If you need a sturdy little coffee or storage cart for the kitchen, this is a good deal. Easy to put together. The weird material smell goes away after its out of the box. Made in China of course, but it looks better than any cart I've seen at Target. The faux wood look is ok and doesn't look super cheap. I needed this cart in pinch. It works. I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: B1R

customer_reviews.title: Bareel y Usable
customer_reviews.text: One significant problem - the rollers/wheels lock randomly-makes moving across room a bit tricky. After using it for a short time -I am convinced it is junk. The wheels cause it to ti p!!! because they lock-up for no clear reason. Produces quite a mess when it tips~~~
customer_reviews.author: K. Irwin Keating, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my microwave
customer_reviews.text: I measured my microwave first to make sure it would fit on it. I live in an apartment with a kitchen that has almost no counter space. This has helped me maximize what I can. It was pretty easy to put together and is easy to move. The hooks that came with it are pretty useless in my opinion. They fall off very easily but I'm sure I can find a use for them elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly used as a coffee cart!
customer_reviews.text: This was a little heavy to move the pieces around but it was super easy to put together. There was one flaw, the little label with the brand name was on upside down which threw me for a loop for a few minutes. Other than that super straight forward photos for assembly. It is really sturdy and fits my Keurig on the top shelf which I was concerned about. The middle shelf is also adjustable so you can decide where you want that which is nice. We are using the hooks on the side to hand mugs and it seems sturdy. The locks on the front wheels work but you can obviously still drag it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lain

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in person!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase! It was very easy to put together and made with better quality than expected! Looks great! I got the brown wood look and it looks great in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: The cart came with all the parts packed very well and it was pretty easy to assemble. It looks really nice and holds my microwave perfectly. I do not have a lot of counter top space and was looking for a place to put the microwave to free up countertop space and this cart is perfect as it doesn't take up a lot of space, but has a lot of storage! I would definitely recommend this cart!
customer_reviews.author: PatB

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The good things first: the cart is relatively easy to assemble; looks very high quality for the price; and fits my 1.6 cu ft microwave quite well. Unfortunately, one of the cross-bars was damaged in shipping and one of the locks on the wheels broke off immediately. The other locking wheel does not do much to lock the unit either. We really do like the piece so we are going to keep it, just need to reinforce it from behind so it can't roll.
customer_reviews.author: Scruffybean718

customer_reviews.title: Good extra counter space
customer_reviews.text: I have just assembled the cart but it seems to be sturdy enough for my use. Had a little minor problem with assembly but nothing common sense didn't figure out. I don't think you can find any some assembly needed furniture that is without a problem with the instructions. I can't speak as to durability as I have just gotten it. It meets my expectations for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B Hall

customer_reviews.title: A really nice cart.
customer_reviews.text: I very seldom write reviews but this cart deserves one. First, the depiction on Amazon looks like what I received. The assembly instructions were much better than most and everything you need is included. Took me about 20 min. It would have been easier with two people. It's in my kitchen and looks great. Blends well with my solid maple cabinets. It could definitely be used in other rooms. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jean

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant directions, easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Superb assembly directions and every single part was labeled like I’ve never seen before. The nuts and bolts were vacuum packed to a piece of cardboard that had every part labeled clearly. Once assembled it’s very sturdy and does not sway at all. The finish on the shelves is easy to clean up. Spacious shelves. Easy rolling wheels over commercial carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey drench

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit! It was extremely easy to assemble and is super sturdy. It is just perfect for all my country too clutter. My stand mixer, food processor, seal-a-meal, and large pots all fit perfectly and my counter space is AMAZING now thanks to this cart. I love that the wheels have breaks so the grandkids can’t push it around.
customer_reviews.author: JENNY L.

customer_reviews.title: Bottom shelves started breaking as I assembled
customer_reviews.text: Though the shelf's build seemed decent at first, three different spots on the bottom two shelves started cracking as soon as I started turning the screws into it during assembly. I'm hoping it holds up for a light load like cutting boards. Too worried about it collapsing to place any of my heavier kitchen appliances (like instant pot) as I originally planned. The top shelf, however, seems strong enough to hold the heavier appliances. Otherwise, assembling it wasn't too complicated with two people.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy 3 shelf cart
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a wood looking cart that would be strong enough to hold storage boxes. This has 3 shelves but there are two shelves set very close together so the bottom shelf will only hold a shallow box. The only deep shelf I can use is the second shelf. I'll keep it to use for corner storage but will keep looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: hurleygirly

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen cart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Mr. Ironstone 3-Tier Bankers Rack to hold my countertop microwave. I wanted something strong that would not fall apart under the weight of my microwave and anything else stored on it. Many of the wooden carts are made of softwood that do not tighten well when you put them together. The storage cart is easy to put together and the direction are very good. I highly recommend the Mr. Ironstoin 3-Tier Storage Cart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I did not assemble the microwave stand myself so I do not know whether it was easy to assemble or not. It seems to be sturdy and if it's the purpose I had for it, which was to make more room on my counter in my small kitchen in a retirement village. The ability to easily roll it out of the way is also important for me.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you measure height and depth if you are looking for specific details
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely little cart. A little bit smaller than I thought it would be. There was a little piece of hardware missing for the cross bar in the back. Other than that I really like it. The color is nicer in person. I was hoping for more height between shelves to store certain baking containers I have but it will suffice for other purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime H

customer_reviews.title: Very well done!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well designed assembly instructions. Each set of screws, for example, is in their own clear bag and the bag is labeled. You should have 8 screws of this size and they're all in a single bag labeled 'G' just like the instructions say. Very easy to assemble, less than 20 minutes. And it's very substantial. I give it an A+.
customer_reviews.author: DooDah Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I really like how sturdy this is and it looks great too. I bought it for a printer stand in my home office and the dimensions are perfect. The only thing is be careful when tightening the screws. I was being careful to just snug them and I raised the surface on the top shelf (as luck would have it). Luckily it isnt really noticeable. You would have to be looking to notice.
customer_reviews.author: lil lisa

customer_reviews.title: Mid-size microwave fits on top shelf
customer_reviews.text: This microwave cart is sturdy, looks great in my kitchen, and my mid-size microwave sits perfectly on the top shelf. Love the locking wheels. The cart doesn't move at all when I open or close the microwave door.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Yes, Honey!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in the recommended three product set and assembled it alone. It took a few hours but that's because it I was already exhausted and not paying attention. But it really isn't difficult and the tools included and instructions are good. The end product is really nice to look at. Modern. Plenty of storage possibilities and multipurpose.
customer_reviews.author: KAE

customer_reviews.title: Had a default but was able to circumvent. Is sturdy and looks just like the photo
customer_reviews.text: I had this almost completely assembled until I ran into an issue of misalignment on behalf of the manufacturer. We were able to drill our own hole and bypassed the issue fairly easily. Once assembled the cart is cute, sturdy and works very well as a home for all of our laptops and random electronics.
customer_reviews.author: MissSillyGoose

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Quality is typical of cheap ready to assemble furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Quality is typical of cheap ready to assemble furniture. One threaded wood insert nuts pulled out of the laminated particle board desktop when tightening down one of the four 30mm bolts during assembly. The three other bolts appear to be holding the top on fine though. Be warned-the laminated shelves and desktop are very slick; you may want to buy some non-slip shelf liners.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Limited kitchen counter and storage space... This is PERFECT for you.
customer_reviews.text: When I brought this microwave earlier this year (2020), I needed a space to store it without taking up the only counter space I had. It was fairly easy to assemble. The extra storage space is great for pots and pans. The hooks are perfect for hanging your essential cooking tools. It also comes with wheels (two of which can be locked) for easy movement.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, the wheels, and the fact that the middle board can be adjusted to fit your needs. Perfect size (not too small and not too big) although I wish it was a bit taller but then I should've gotten something else. The sides can be used to hand additional appliances/cleaning sprays, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Zee K

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the cheapest one on the market, and it really shows. It came in good condition, assembly took maybe 30mins tops, and is spacious enough to accommodate my large 1000watt microwave. Got this to create more counter space, it does the job and looks great. Wooden parts feel decently heavy/solid. I’m not sure how sturdy the little wheels are, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazongirl777

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Cart
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I needed a small cart to help me free up space in my cabinets. Was easy to assemble and seems quite sturdy. Definitely like it because it fits under my counter top and isn’t in the way. My only complaint, and it’s not that big of a deal because I can get them at any hardware store, but my package did not include the 10 hooks. The box had been damaged so perhaps they fell out. That’s the only reason for the 4 stars. Despite that, I’m very happy with this purchase. It’s exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, great functionality!
customer_reviews.text: This rolling cart was very easy to assemble. Looks great, and is sturdy. We are using it in the kitchen. It is not quite the same height as the counters, so if you are looking to extend counters, check the height measurements. Overall it functions well for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: kquick78

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, if assembled properly
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things that you have to sit down and read the instructions first, so you don't bend the pieces. I like it, because it's the perfect height for me to use in my wheelchair, and it slides back under the counter easily.it can be assembled for tall appliances, or two rows of short appliances
customer_reviews.author: Guermo Torres

customer_reviews.title: Efficient but not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product was pretty easy to assemble and very useful. The second rack fits my microwave and I am able to use the first rack as a kitchen counter space. The reason I took away stars is while screwing in the screw for the first board into the metal rails, the plastic bit inside the wood into which the screw fits dislodged and came loose from the board. So my top board is attached with 3 screws to the frame instead of 4. Kind of disappointed with that. Edit 28 Sept 2020: The seller reached out to me with an apology which has never been my experience on Amazon. They also offered a refund. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sweta

customer_reviews.title: By far the best Amazon purchase experience!!
customer_reviews.text: This came on time, packaging was perfect and it was so organized & easy to assemble. I think it took me less than 25min. by myself. It looks fantastic! No nicks, scratches, dents, all new--I'm so happy with it! I love the email that was sent beforehand provding a pdf with instructions just incase they were missing and they started an open line of communication incase there were any issues. I feel so happy & secure about my purchase that I will definitely look to Mr. Ironstone for more furniture items.
customer_reviews.author: M@G1K@T

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and appears to be sturdy. The only issue is it is supposed to come with 2 locking and 2 non-working casters, it came with only non-working casters. Emailed the vendor and they responded that they would send locking casters. Will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: A high quality item
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the simplest to assemble thing that I have ever purchased. My wife has mobility problems and needed something to move items around in the kitchen. She is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Fontes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: We removed a dishwasher that is not needed for just 2 people. This unit is perfect for the spot. Right height, width , length for our purpose. Small appliance storage to clear counters but still be easy to access because it rolls out. Nice to have a little more work pace when it is pulled out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the cart I received today. The holes for the screws were not completed so I couldn’t put screws through. Also the one screw split the wood when tightening it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Ann McCulloch

product_meta.title: Mr IRONSTONE 3-Tier Kitchen Baker's Rack Utility Microwave Oven Stand Storage Cart Workstation Shelf(Light Beige Top+White Metal Frame)
feature_bullets: 3-Tier Ample Storage & Multipurpose Shelves: Classic 3-tier structure with ideal size 23.7"L* 15.75"W * 28.74"H for your counter space, the sturdy top shelf can hold a microwave oven and other kitchen appliances.The 2nd/3rd tiers can be stored toaster, spice, dishes, and any other things you want. Little hooks make it convenient to hang some cooking tools.

Movable & Lockable Design: 4 flexible wheels, 2 of which are lockable, allow the cart table to go where you go. You can effortlessly wheel it to living room, office or bedroom as a kitchen appliance cart, coffee stand, small rolling bookshelf or small bakers rack. And the locks will keep it perfectly still when needed.

Solid & Sturdy Construction: the portable wheel desk is constructed by high quality P2 MDF light beige board and white metal frame.The white metal frame offers large weight capacity, the top shelf even up to 55 lbs with 2nd/3rd shelf max to 15 lbs, which ensures the stability and durability.

Fast Installation & Easy Cleaning: the utility cart table is need to be assembled by yourself.Tools and instructions that needed are included in the package. It's easy to put it together with the detailed instructions.And with wet cloth you can wipe dirty stain easily from the smooth surface.

Professional Customer Service: If you have any quality problems within one year, you can contact us any time for after-sales service. Our experienced customer service team will response in 24 hours ASAP.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,140 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
